name: Bogdan Ursu
body: ### About me I am a second year master student at École Normale Supérieure de Cachan, where my main directions of study are cryptography, complexity and computability. I have graduated my first year of master with a thesis on shortest vector problem solvers, carried out under the supervision of Prof. Serge Vaudenay, at the EPFL. Before, I have obtained my Bachelor of Computer Science from University Alexandru Ioan Cuza of Iasi, where I have worked with Prof. Ferucio Laurentiu Tiplea. As an undergraduate Erasmus student, I have also followed the research master in cryptography at Université Joseph-Fourier, most notably the courses on elliptic and hyperelliptic curve cryptography taught by Ms. Vanessa Vitse. *** ### Thesis First year of master research internship Sieving Algorithms for the Shortest Vector Problem, supervised by Prof. Serge Vaudenay [Report](https://bogdanbear.github.io/projects/Bogdan_Ursu_M1_Report .pdf) [Slides](https://bogdanbear.github.io/projects/Bogdan_Ursu_M1_Slides.pdf) *** Diploma thesis Factorization and DLP in a Subexponential Setting, supervised by Prof. F.L. Tiplea [Thesis](https://bogdanbear.github.io/projects/Bachelor Thesis.pdf ) [Slides](https://bogdanbear.github.io/projects/Bogdan_Ursu_M1_Slides.pdf) *** ## Curriculum Vitae It can be found [here](https://bogdanbear.github.io/resources/cv.pdf)
